name: Geta Games Team Collection
description:
Geta Games Team was an online team that I founded in 2015 and closed at the start of 2021. Throughout its runtime, there were several members who joined and left, as well as many collaborations with people outside the team. The credits should be contained in the games themselves.

Even though most of the games were made for jams, there were some larger projects that we took on (measured by development time), including Thermal Youngsters, Space Funeral 6, Inferno, MANIC, and the incomplete Underwater Game. Furthermore, there are three games (Upsurge, Depurate, and Globin) that are under the name of Low Games, which are each relatively substantial.

We also ran a tri-yearly game jam, naturally titled Geta Game Jam, which had a lot of great submissions. Definitely check those out!

Alright, I hope you enjoy!! 💚👽
